item.title: Get hwnd of window
item.dc:creator: @cruel cruel
item.description:
@cruel wrote:

lawl, you’re actually spamming up this thread by replying without reading.
Read my above post and address that please.
We might as well merge all threads…

There are many advantages to separate threads, which include, but are not limited to the fact that:
-Topics are separated so questions don’t have to be specificed to certain portion of the thread
-Easier indexing for people searching the forum for related topics
-Better organization so you don’t have people conversing about different topics in the same thread and making clutter.

And what are the down-sides?
That there are too many threads?
Deal with it. kthx.

Read full topic
